name: Dankest Dungeon (GadgetPatch)
description:
A gameboy demake of Darkest Dungeon, by Red Hook Studios.
Made by a team in a few weeks, for Mini Ludum Dare 50.

Fun Fact: This demake was made well before the original was released. We reverse-engineered the gameplay based on early promotional videos and screenshots. Ended up surprisingly accurate IMO!

GAMEPLAY:

  • WASD or Arrows to move and navigate menus
  • Enter or X to confirm choices
  • Escape or Z to cancel
  • There are 4 levels to the Dungeon. See if you can reach the bottom!
  • HINT: Use consumable items for better results in events
  • Check the gameplay manual on the right for more info

    • CREDITS:

    Marius (MagmaMcFry): Code, Design
    Elysée (Vector): Writing
    Holly (Fireh9lly): Music
    Dana (Sunspider): Art, Design
